RadPlusWidgetSQLMulti.title: Service Authorizations
RadPlusWidgetSQLMulti.sqlcode1:
SELECT 'MSO116' as OPTIONNAME <HIDE:OPTIONNAME>, sad.AUTuniqueid as "ID" <HIDE:ID>, sad.PATID As "PATID" <LINK:OPTIONNAME:PATID:ID:::PATID>, sad.FACILITY <HIDE:FACILITY> , sad.provider_name as "Contracting Provider", sad.perf_provider_name as "Performing Provider", sas.procedure_code as "Procedure Code", sad.begin_date_of_auth as "Begin Date", sad.end_date_of_auth as "End Date", sad.auth_level_care_value as "Auth Level of Care", sad.rem_liab_total As "Total Amount", sad.authorization_number As "Auth Number", sad.data_entry_by As "Entered By", sad.data_entry_date As "Entry Date"
FROM SYSTEM.service_auth_detail sad INNER JOIN SYSTEM.service_auth_svc sas ON sad.FACILITY = sas.FACILITY AND sad.PATID = sas.PATID AND sad.AUTuniqueid = sas.AUTUniqueID AND sas."row_number" = 1 WHERE sad.FACILITY = ?FACILITY AND sad.PATID = ?PATID ORDER BY sad.data_entry_date DESC
